text: Barwadih is a Block present in Latehar district of Jharkhand state in India. == Barwadih block == === About barwadih block === Barwadih is a Block in Latehar District of Jharkhand State, India. Barwadih Block Headquarters is Barwadih town . It is located 47 km towards west from District headquarters Latehar. 157 km from State capital Ranchi towards East . Barwadih Block is bounded by Chainpur Block towards North, Satbarwa Block towards East, Manika Block towards East, Daltonganj Block towards North . Daltonganj City, Garhwa City, Lohardaga City, Hussainabad City are the nearby Cities to Barwadih. Barwadih consist of 88 Villages and 16 Panchayats. It is in the elevation (altitude) . This Place is in the border of the Latehar District and Palamu District. Palamu District Chainpur is North towards this place . Betla National Park, Palamu, Latehar, Netarhat, Lohardaga are the nearby Important tourist destinations to see. === Railway stations in Barwadih === Barwadih Junction railway station is one of the important railway junction in Latehar District. === Villages in Barwadih === Barwadih, Betla, Chhencha, Chhipadohar, Chungru, Ganeshpur, Haratu, Ker, Ketchki, Khura, Kuchila, Lat, Mangra, Morwai, Kala, Pokhrikala, Ukamanr, Aghara, Akhara, Amdiha Amwatikar, Babhanddih Barawadih, Barkheta Bonchattan, Bondohare, Bore Chamaradiha, Chapari, Chatam, Chunguru, Dorami, Gari Goshedag Guwa, Harinamar, Harne Harpurwa, Hehegara Hendehas Horilong, Hosir, Hutar, Cohary, Jurgarh, Juruhar, Kachanpur, Kalayanpur, Kalpurwa, Karadih, Kechaki, Khami Khas, Kuku, Kushha, Bathan Kutamu, Labhar, Ladi, Lanka, Ledgani Luhur, Lukum, Khar, Mandal Mangara Mantu, Meral, Morwai, Khurd Mundu, Murgidih, Murmu, Nawadih Nawar, Nagu, Opag, Paira, Patradih, Pokhari, Kala, Pokhari, Khurd, Putwa, Garn, Rabdh, Ramandag, Saidup, Sarandih, Selari, Tanr, Serandag, Sindhorwa, Sukulkatha, Tanwai, Tatha, Togri, Ukumari, Grwathand, Addarsh Nagar === Demographics of Barwadih Block === Hindi is the Local Language here. Also People Speaks Santali . Total population of Barwadih Block is 78,515 living in 14,590 Houses, Spread across total 88 villages and 16 panchayats. Males are 40,619 and Females are 37,896 Total 7,218 persons lives in town and 71,297 lives in Rural. === Weather and Climate of Barwadih Block === It is Hot in summer. Barwadih summer highest day temperature is in between 24 °C to 45 °C . Average temperatures of January is 16 °C, February is 20 °C, March is 25 °C, April is 30 °C, May is 35 °C . ==Geography== Barwadih is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Barwadih It has an average elevation of 334 metres (1095 feet). Betla National Park is situated 8 km from Barwadih. ==Demographics== India census, Barwadih had a population of 7888. Males constitute 4160 of the population and females 3728. Barwadih has an average literacy rate of 5646; with 3226 of the males and 2420 of females literate. 1109 of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Education== ===Schools=== * Government. Boys High School, Barwadih St. Claret School, Barwadih * Bal Shiksha Niketan, Barwadih * Government.
